[i]Roar[/i] – When Lethe, Gallia's Claw enters, you may pay {R}{G}. If you do, up to two target creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain haste until end of turn.
[i]Laguz Stone[/i] – Whenever a creature you control transforms or becomes promoted, put a +1+1 counter on each Shapeshifter you control.
[i]Rampant Claw[/i] – Whenever Lethe, Gallia's Claw deals combat damage to a player, put a trample counter on target creature you control.
Partner with Ranulf, Friend of Nations
